alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 12:26PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Itawamba, northeastern Lee, southern Tishomingo and eastern Prentiss Counties through 100 PM CST... At 1226 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Thrashers to 7 miles southwest of Burton to near Pratts Friendship. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Iuka, Tishomingo State Park, Belmont, Tishomingo, Sandy Springs, Burton, Midway, Pratts Friendship, Marietta, Golden, Paden, Oldham, Chapelville, Thrasher, Dennis, Moores Mill, Blythe Crossing, Kirkville, Carter Branch and Mingo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
